<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong><span lang="EN-US" style="color: black;">Job Responsibilities:</span></strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Organize / Follow security system and the installation work</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Responsible for design submission, planning, supervision and monitoring</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ensure working procedure, inspection and quality standard</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Liaise with suppliers for technical purchasing</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Liaise with customers for job specification</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><strong>職責</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>負責大型冷氣系統或商廈樓宇管理系統的安裝、維修、保養及檢查</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;">職責範疇：</span></strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 12pt;">負責安裝、維修及保養不同的保安系統，如：警鐘系統、閉路電視、公共天線及其他電子產品</span>&nbsp;</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Job Responsibilities:</strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Coordinate and manage regular and emergency repair and maintenance works(E&amp;M) for properties</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Conduct regular site inspection to monitor the progress of maintenance works and provide recommendations for improvement</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Handle enquiries and complaints about maintenance works and provide appropriate solutions after investigation</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Coordinate with all the relevant parties to ensure safety during the implementation of maintenance works</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Keep proper records of all documents including tendering and quotations&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong><span lang="EN-GB">OBJECTIVES/PURPOSE OF JOB:</span></strong></span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span lang="EN-GB" style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span lang="EN-US">To achieve sales objectives of designated channels and product lines. To provide professional application support on SURGICAL products</span></span><br><br><br><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong><span lang="EN-GB">KEY</span></strong><strong><span lang="EN-GB"> ACTIVITIES/RESPONSIBILITIES:</span></strong>&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li><span lang="IT" style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Responsible for sales coverage in assigned area. </span></li>
<li><span lang="IT" style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Develop customer and channel business plan.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To call on clinics, doctors and hospital to promote and sell assigned product line.&nbsp; </span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To provide on-site product demonstration and application support to customers.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To build rapport with customers </span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To collect and report market and competitive information on regularly basis</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To prepare call plan and field visit report</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To prepare quotation and other paper work for customers</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Perform other duties as assigned. </span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <ul>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Prepare sketches and conceptual drawings</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Prepare interior design presentation including perspective, mood board and material sample</span></li>

<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">General project administration</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-align: justify; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><strong>ENGINEERING MANAGER/ PROJECT MANAGER (2 posts,Home appliances)</strong></p>
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-align: justify; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; color: black; font-size: 11pt;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;">Requirements:</span></span></p>
<ul style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 1em; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">
<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span lang="EN-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 11pt;">Good knowledge in small home electrical appliances &amp; safety approval (UL / CSA / GS / VDE etc.) plus Pro/E</span><span lang="EN-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; color: black; font-size: 11pt;">.</span></li>
<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span lang="EN-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 11pt;">Work independently and under pressure</span><span lang="EN-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; color: black; font-size: 11pt;">.</span></li>
<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span lang="EN-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 11pt;">Excellent communication technique / team spirit.</span><span lang="EN-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; color: black; font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;</span></li>
<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span lang="EN-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 11pt;">Good sense of responsibility and accountability</span><span lang="EN-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; color: black; font-size: 11pt;">.</span></li>
<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span lang="EN-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 11pt;">Over 10 years in product design, project &amp; management experience.</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;<strong>Responsibilities</strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To assist in planning maintenance budget and control maintenance budget</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></span></p>
<ul>

<!-- jobad content --> <p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline; font-size: 12pt;">Overview</span></strong></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="text-align: justify;">As a </span><span style="text-align: justify;">Project</span><span style="text-align: justify;"> Engineer </span><span style="text-align: justify;">(R&amp;D) </span><span style="text-align: justify;">- based in Hong Kong, you will be responsible for leading the full design management of product performance, reliability and manufacturability in a professional, resourceful and compliant manner. You will be competent in developing mechanism based on design and/or customer&rsquo;s requirements with a vital understanding of the manufacturing process. Additionally, you will be able to work across core functional teams to enhance, resolve or develop new processes and milestones to meet overall business objectives. The ideal </span><span style="text-align: justify;">Project</span><span style="text-align: justify;"> Engineer </span><span style="text-align: justify;">(R&amp;D) </span><span style="text-align: justify;">will be resourceful, task-orientated, able to influence and engage with all levels of stakeholders with a passion for product development.</span></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline; font-size: 12pt;"><strong>Key Responsibilities </strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="color: windowtext; font-size: 12pt;">Manage/Develop Mechanical design of Various Material of Innovative Products, not limited to only plastic and stainless steel</span></li>
<li><span style="color: windowtext; font-size: 12pt;">To co-ordinate in design, engineering development, testing and validation of new product</span></li>
<li><span style="color: windowtext; font-size: 12pt;">Study, brainstorm and generate solutions to technical and design problems</span></li>
<li><span style="color: windowtext; font-size: 12pt;">Create, monitor and manage prototype design, modification, and timeline</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Applicants should have a passion for creating new ideas and trying to figure out &ldquo;what&rsquo;s next?&rdquo; Must be super creative and comfortable working in the early phases of a project where you will translate user insights into clever solutions through compelling/clear visuals. Your creativity, drive and passion for bringing products and experiences to life will be essential to your position. Within your role you will be expected to collaborate with engineers, researchers, other designers, management, outside resources and clients. If you are self-motivated, creative and looking to work with a fun, but focused group in a strong team environment, we&rsquo;d like to hear from you.</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Job Description: </strong><strong>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">This position must meet multiple deadlines and goals in regard to analyzing research and designing products for presentations to customers, new product development and research projects</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">The Industrial Designer must possess design skills, free hand, computer aided design, and sample making. They must have complete understanding of the new product development process and basic engineering skills in order to work with engineering to insure manufacturability of the designs created</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">This position requires great attention to detail and up-to-date knowledge of computer aided design, model making and design technique to enhance the performance of the duties</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">This position requires the ability to meet aggressive deadlines, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and to work in a fast-paced, dynamic, customer and team-oriented work environment</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Key Job Responsibilities include but are not limited to: Design Product that meets the Customer&rsquo;s needs. Develop prototypes. Manage outside services. Understand the unique perspectives of Marketing, Engineering, Internal Departments &amp; vendors. Have a thorough understanding of Engineering and Manufacturing processes</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">The ideal person for this position has the following: A strong technical background and a proven understanding with the development process of new products. Minimum 7 years of similar experience within a consumer products company</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Mechanical Design or Manufacture Engineering, knowledge of Pro-E, or Solid works Demonstrated Project Management skills Excellent analytical, creativity, problem solving, teamwork and communication skills Ability to stay current with trends, software and techniques of the trade</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <ul>
<li><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">To assist Estimators / Senior Estimators in tendering;</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Diploma or above in Building, Civil Engineering, Quantity Surveying or equivalent; </span></li>
<li><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">1 year or above&nbsp;experience in Surveying is an advantage</span><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">.</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="color: black; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Reporting to the Research Fellow, the appointee will be required to: </span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">select the proper reactor equipment and communicate with various vendors on the reactor equipment requirements;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="color: black;">steer the fabrication progress of the reactor equipment, witness the factory acceptance test and coordinate equipment delivery and installation</span>;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="color: black;">work on the experiments of solid state polymerization</span>;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">manage R&amp;D projects, including technical and financial aspects and other project administrative tasks, such as preparing project updates and reports;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">work closely with R&amp;D researchers and personnel;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">coordinate with local and overseas universities, research institutions and business partners, and handle enquires in a professional manner; and</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">perform any other duties as assigned.</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="color: black;">Reporting to the Director, Project Development, the appointee will be required to</span>:</span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">design the dyeing machine by inputting design elements, integrate the design elements into the process flow and evaluate the operating cost of the dyeing machine;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">plan and coordinate the overall project as well as preparing technical reports for the project;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">manage R &amp; D projects, <span style="color: black;">including technical and financial aspects and other project administrative tasks such as preparing project updates and reports;</span></span></li>

<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Verdana, sans-serif;">The <span style="color: #003300;"><strong>Facility Management Executive - R&amp;M</strong></span> supports the Director of Operations Asia and the Business Development &amp; Partnership Manager whilst working with the Operations team to ensure that Pret&rsquo;s existing estate is managed effectively and efficiently.&nbsp;</span></p>

<!-- jobad content --> <p>The Critical Facilities Manager is responsible for all aspects of data centre operations and maintenance.</p>
<p><strong>Responsibilities include but not limited to:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Managing the operation and maintenance of critical and non-critical data centre infrastructure, equipment, and systems</li>
<li>Ensuring all work performed is done to a high quality and without impact to internal/external customers</li>
<li>Managing power and cooling capacity and monitor environmental conditions within the data centre</li>
<li>Resolving all electrical, mechanical and Fire Protection System issues in the data centre while minimizing risk and communicate issues to management and customers</li>
<li>Assist CFM with managing facilities support and operations staff</li>
<li>In the absence of the CFM, assume a leadership role with limited authority</li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Carry out equipment installation, testing, commissioning, operations and maintenance of Air Traffic Control systems, including radar systems, navigational systems, communication systems, power supply systems, database/IT systems &amp; networks located dispersedly in Hong Kong</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>The Job</strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Perform regular system status monitoring and schedule preventive maintenance</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Responsible for corrective maintenance including fault diagnosis, system restoration and repair</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Assist in on-site equipment installation, testing, commissioning of equipment</span></li>

<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 10pt;">Responsibilities:</span></p>

<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;">To prepare the necessary site paper work and documentation of project in progress;</li>

<!-- jobad content --> <table style="box-sizing: content-box; font-family: Arial, 新細明體, mingliu; font-size: 13px; line-height: 18px;" border="0" width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tbody style="box-sizing: content-box;">
<tr style="box-sizing: content-box;">
<td class="main02" style="font-family: Arial, 新細明體, mingliu; font-size: 13px; box-sizing: content-box;">
<p style="margin: 14px 0px; box-sizing: content-box;"><strong style="box-sizing: content-box;">Job Descriptions:</strong></p>
<ul style="margin: 14px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 40px; box-sizing: content-box;">
<li style="box-sizing: content-box;">Design and maintain sophisticated real time control system used in car parking and traffic control industry</li>
<li style="box-sizing: content-box;">Perform project development including specification design, system design and software programming</li>
<li style="box-sizing: content-box;">Provide technical support to ongoing projects</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Duty:</span></strong></span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To co-ordinate new start-up service / T&amp;C service &amp; after sales service for chiller system</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To conduct software upload and control troubleshooting for chiller system</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To provide maintenance &amp; repair service back up to service teams</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To communicate with factories to resolve various technical problems</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To provide BMS &amp; high level control interface with building equipment<br><br><br></span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: left;">Job Requirements&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>Form 5 or above</li>
<li>At least&nbsp;5 years&nbsp;experience in supervising external walls maintenance &amp; refurbishment or Interior renovation</li>
<li>T1 or above qualification</li>
<li>Less experience or without T1 qualification will be considered&nbsp;as Assistant Foreman</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; color: black;">RESPONSIBILITIES</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; color: black;">Cost validation and justification on costing components that relevant to premium toy costing</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; color: black;">Support engineering team on model pricing, manage final cost of the program within target and report cost differences to team and foreign offices </span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; color: black;">Communicate and collaborate with project engineer to develop to an optimum product value to customers</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; color: black;">Periodic review price of cost factors to maintain competitive pricing</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; color: black;">Prepare purchased parts databases to keep track materials trend</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; color: black;">Prepare cost analysis and benchmarks based on historical and ongoing prices</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; color: black;">Support RFP cost savings tracking mechanism, data management, calculation and reports<strong>&nbsp;</strong></span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; color: black;">Travelling to China if necessary, such as models review and factory study.</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Duties:</strong><br></span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Responsible for tendering</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p><strong><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 14pt;">Purpose of the Role:</span></strong></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Our </span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Service </span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Delivery </span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Engineer</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> are professional technical services </span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">engineer</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> responsible for delivery of services into key enterprise customers. The key responsibility of the SD</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">E</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;"> is design, implementation and maintenance of </span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">IPT </span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">system</span><span style="font-family: 'MS Mincho',serif; font-size: 12pt;">,</span><span style="font-size: 12pt;">follow and satisfy the customer&rsquo;s need.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>

<!-- jobad content --> <h1 class="entry-title"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><label>Reference #:&nbsp;</label>2017/ART221/LCESD/PI</span></h1>
<div class="panel panel-default careers-description">
<div class="panel-body" style="background-color: #f0faff;">
<div><hr></div>
<div>
<h4><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Job Responsibilities</span></h4>
<div>
<p><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Assist in ITF R&amp;D project as assigned</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Responsible for layout designing and verification of SRAM memory compilers</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Develop layout coding skills and place &amp; routing combining algorithm. Learn and apply these skills in memory compilers having transistor level layout design on advanced technologies</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Maintain accurate and complete documentation of work</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Responsibilities:&nbsp;</strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;">To build work flow and provide training to staff.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;">To audit work flow is followed.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black;">To conduct continuous improvement in services to clients.</span></li>

<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">7天有薪婚假&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></li>

color: red;">；同時，</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-family: 新細明體, serif; color: red;">第二分校及第三分校亦即將投入服務</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-family: 新細明體, serif; color: red;">，歡迎您加入我們的教育平台。</span></span></p>
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0cm 0cm 0.0001pt; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; background-color: #ffffff; text-align: justify;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-decoration: underline;"><span lang="ZH-HK" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; color: #0070c0;">入職要求</span></span></strong><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-decoration: underline;"><span lang="EN-US" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; color: #0070c0;">Requirements</span></span></strong><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-decoration: underline;"><span lang="ZH-HK" style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; color: black; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">：</span></span></strong></span></p>
<ul style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 1em; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; background-color: #ffffff;">
<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; color: #ff0000;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">歡迎「海外回流」、「本屆畢業生」或「持IANG」申請</span></strong></span></li>

</li>

</li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: black; font-size: 10pt;">Our client, a Hong Kong listed company, is the world-leading manufacturer of electronic technology for high quality electronic products. They are now seeking for a professional candidate with strong electronic and R&amp;D background to join their company.</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: black; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: black; font-size: 10pt;">Responsibilities:</span></p>
<ul>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: black; font-size: 10pt;">Lead a team of engineers with supervision to handle the product design and development of embedded system (includes AC &amp; DC).</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: black; font-size: 10pt;">Manage overall design projects from circuit design, simulation, test plan creation, debug of system to failure analysis and ensure smooth deliverables with good control of budget and time frame. </span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: black; font-size: 10pt;">Setup best practices and rules for the corresponding sub-system circuit design.</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; color: black; font-size: 10pt;">Perform testing and fine-tuning of the system to meet business objectives.</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="color: black;">Conduct </span><span style="color: black;">root cause analysis and provide corrective actions.</span></span></li>

<li><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Identify technical issues by demonstrating proven project management methodology &nbsp;</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify; line-height: 15.0pt;"><strong><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; color: #333333;">Job Description:</span></strong></p>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><strong>Responsibilities</strong></span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Supervise a technical team to handle all repair and maintenance works for a Grade A commercial building</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><strong>Responsibilities</strong></span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Assist the technical team to handle owner&rsquo;s/ tenant&rsquo;s requests on technical related services</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Conducting routine inspection and preparing inspection reports</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Assisting preparation of tender documents for the repair, maintenance and replacement services</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Supervising repair and maintenance works of subcontractors</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Participate in ad hoc duties as assigned</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">In May 2008, HiSilicon (a wholly owned semiconductor subsidiary of Huawei) set up an R&amp;D center in Hong Kong, focusing on communication chipset development. Today, we are expanding our R&amp;D work to next generation products that would be used in a wide range of Huawei products. We are looking for enthusiastic and high caliber engineers at all levels to work with our team in Shenzhen and Hong Kong, to support the development from system and architectural design, modeling, algorithm derivation, DSP programming to system testing and verification. Travel between the 2 locations is required.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">The Algorithm/DSP Software Engineers will be responsible or take part in defining the algorithm/DSP SW of different major functional units of a communication system, focusing on the physical and MAC layer. The individual shall be responsible for or contribute to the various phase of the development work, including but not limited to algorithm development, feasibility studies, performance modeling and analysis, MIPs analysis, DSP coding and testing. The individual shall work closely with the ASIC engineers to deliver the complete low cost, low power, and high performance solution for wireline networking application. </span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">Responsibilities</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Develop communication algorithms and carry through implementation.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Work on embedded DSP software in leading-edge communication systems and products.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Generate design and implementation documentation.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Perform system level integration, board bring-up and performance tuning.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">Desired Skills and Experience</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Experience with </span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">the algorithm/DSP SW design/testing in one or more of the following disciplines:</span></p>
<ul>
<li>Communication and signal processing theory, e.g. MIMO, diversity, estimation theory, filtering, FFT etc.</li>
<li>Forward error correction Algorithm, e.g. LDPC, Turbo code, Reed Solomon, Trellis Coding, Viterbi etc.</li>
<li>Noise Cancellation Algorithms/Scheme, e.g. Interleaving, Echo Cancellation etc.</li>
<li>Probability and statistics, linear algebra, optimization theory</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">In May 2008, HiSilicon-Huawei setup an R&amp;D center in Hong Kong, focusing on communication chipset development. Today, we are expanding our R&amp;D work to next generation products that would be used in a wide range of Huawei products. We are looking for enthusiastic and high caliber engineers at all levels to join our team, to support the development from system and architectural design, modeling, micro-architecture design to front-end implementations and verification.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">The Senior ASIC Design Engineers will be responsible or take part in defining the micro-architecture of different major functional units of a communication system, focusing on the MAC and physical layer. The individual shall be responsible or contribute to the various phase of the development work, including but not limited to feasibility studies, cost and power estimation, performance and functional modeling, micro-architecture definition, front end design and verification, and synthesis. The individual shall work closely with the rest of the team to deliver the communication SOC that meets the requirements of low cost, low-power, and high performance for wireline networking application. </span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">Responsibilities</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Perform architecture, micro-architecture and logic design using synthesis tools for SOC product.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Verify design by computer simulation and/ or emulation.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Prepare and maintain block diagram, schematics and components information.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Oversee and perform layout design, timing analysis and ECO logic changes.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Evaluate and characterize FPGA/ASIC prototype units.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt;">Desired Skills and Experience</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Minimum of 5 years of proven design </span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">or verification </span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">experience in complex SOC projects </span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Experience with communication ASIC architecture/design</span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">/verification</span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">&nbsp; </span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Wingdings;">&uuml;<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">&nbsp; </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">Experience with </span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman',serif;">the design/verification in one or more of the following disciplines:</span></p>
<ul>
<li>DSP Algorithms, e.g. Digital Filters, FFT etc.</li>
<li>Forward error correction Algorithm, e.g. LDPC, Reed Solomon, Trellis Coding, Viterbi etc.</li>
<li>Noise Cancellation Algorithms/Scheme, e.g. Interleaving, Echo Cancellation, MIMO, etc.</li>
<li>Network and High Speed Interfaces, e.g. XGMII, RGMII, GMII, SERDES</li>
<li>SOC processor and peripherals, e.g. ARM cores, DSP cores, SPI, UART, GPIO etc.</li>
<li>TCP/IP networking/service packet protocols</li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p>Objectives of the program are to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Recruit, train up and develop a team of management talents with the skills and knowledge to meet and lead the future developments of the Company</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><strong>DESCRIPTION SUMMARY:</strong></span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Radius has evolved a unique consulting model that combines inspired user experience design with deep technical horsepower and expertise in design for manufacturability. We work with the world&rsquo;s leading companies, helping them create and bring to market meaningful products and solutions that improve experiences and enhance lives. We help our clients bridge the difficult divide between concept and commercialization.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Our clients come to us to help navigate the growing demand and complexity of converging technology, business models, and user expectations. We&rsquo;re established in the Internet of Things, Digital Lifestyle, Connected Health, Smart Cities, among others convergent spaces; yet have two decades of experience working across a broad spectrum of industries. We provide focused market, technology and development expertise in consumer, commercial/industrial, brand packaging, and healthcare markets.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">At Radius, our secret ingredient is our people.&nbsp; We hire talented individuals with a passion for delivering results that know how to design, develop and deliver products that are better than anything on the market today.&nbsp;&nbsp; We build multi-disciplinary teams of product strategists, researchers, designers, human factors specialists, engineers, quality, and manufacturing experts who thrive on solving our clients&rsquo; most complex challenges.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><strong><span style="line-height: 115%; color: black;">The Responsibilities: Consultative and Proactive Business Development</span></strong></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">We are looking for a talented, experienced, and highly motivated business development professional to join our team.&nbsp; This role will report to the Vice President, Global Business Development with a dotted line to and significant partnership with the site Managing Director and leadership and program personnel across Radius offices.&nbsp; As part of the management team, you will proactively contribute to the strategic direction of Radius, growing new and existing clients, and the quality of the firm&rsquo;s services and deliverables.&nbsp; You will be responsible for ensuring sustained business growth of the firm through continual sales from the&nbsp;&nbsp; identification, qualification and closure of new potential clients.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">This is a highly visible and dynamic position whose focus will be on Radius site specific and global organizational initiatives.</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 10pt; line-height: 115%;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">You coordinate and administer the site business development activity including the targeting, prospecting, proactive outreach, forecasting, tracking and strategic response to customer needs to support the closure of business and sustained customer satisfaction</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Requirements:</strong></span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">High Diploma or Degree in Structural / Building Services / Civil / Construction / Mechanical Engineering or related disciplines</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">As least 2 years working experience</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Proficient in AutoCAD </span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Good command of both written and spoken English and Chinese</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Good in communication skills</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Independent, hardworking, self-motivated and able to work under pressure<br><br><br></span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Reporting to the Assistant Project Manager, the incumbent will go through a series of on-the-job training in project management on overall renovation projects from design to site works and provide facilities services, including but not limited to coordination works of tender process and licensing &amp; certification matter for our catering business.&nbsp; He / she will assist in planning, managing, monitoring and evaluating on overall renovation project to ensure effective execution of plan.</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Requirements:</strong></span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li style="text-align: left; line-height: 12.0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Higher Diploma or University Graduate in Building Service Engineering / Building studies or Engineering related disciplines</span></li>
<li style="text-align: left; line-height: 12.0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">1 years of work experience or Good team player with strong interpersonal skills</span></li>
<li style="text-align: left; line-height: 12.0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Good command on written English and Chinese. </span></li>
<li style="text-align: left; line-height: 12.0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Detail-minded with good analytical skills</span></li>
<li style="text-align: left; line-height: 12.0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Ability to handle correspondence and work independently.</span></li>
<li style="text-align: left; line-height: 12.0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Able to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines</span></li>
<li style="text-align: left; line-height: 12.0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Proficiency in Microsoft office application and Chinese Word Processing&nbsp; </span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><strong>Responsibilities</strong>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">The incumbent will be responsible for designing and planning building services system in stores as well as preparing the tender documents, conducting project execution and site supervision on fitting out works/renovations. Also, he/she has to conduct site progress meeting and monitor site works of contractors, including but not limited to coordinate Builder and E&amp;M works.</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><strong>Requirements</strong></span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Diploma or above in Building Services Engineering / Electrical or Mechanical Engineering or equivalents</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">2 years or above relevant field working experience, F&amp;B experience is highly preferred</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Statory Food Lincense&nbsp;knowledge would be an advantage</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Independent with excellent problem solving skills, well-organized with good sense of responsibility and integrity</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Good communication skills in both English and Chinese</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Proficient in PC applications such as MS Office and AutoCAD</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Candidates with less experience will be conisdered&nbsp;as <span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Assistant Officer</strong></span></span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;"><strong>Requirements:</strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Degree or Higher Diploma in Structural / Building Services / Civil / Construction / Mechanical Engineering or related disciplines</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">At least 2-5 years working experience</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="line-height: normal;"><strong><span style="font-size: 12pt;">DESCRIPTION SUMMARY:</span></strong></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 10pt;">Radius Innovation and Development (</span><a href="http://www.radiuspd.com/"><span style="color: blue; line-height: 115%; font-size: 10pt;">radiusinnovation.com</span></a><span style="line-height: 115%; font-size: 10pt;">) is seeking a talented and experienced Manager of Implementation to join our new Hong Kong office.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Radius is a global innovation and development consulting firm serving the healthcare, packaging, and consumer and commercial/industrial markets. At Radius, our secret ingredient is our people. We hire talented individuals with a passion for delivering results that know how to design, develop and deliver products that are better than anything on the market today.&nbsp;&nbsp; We build multi-disciplinary teams of product strategists, researchers, designers, human factors specialists, engineers, quality, and manufacturing experts who thrive on solving our clients&rsquo; most complex challenges for bringing successful products to market.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Join our award winning team if you want to sharpen your skills and geek out on a variety of projects. It goes without saying; we offer a dynamic, fast-paced work environment with plenty of growth opportunities, excellent compensation, and benefits.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">We are currently looking for an experienced Manager of Implementation.&nbsp; Join our award winning team if you want to sharpen your skills on a variety of projects.&nbsp; It goes without saying; we offer a dynamic, fast-paced work environment with plenty of growth opportunities, excellent compensation, and benefits.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">The Manager of Implementation is responsible for coaching, facilitating, mentoring and training the engineering discipline as well as providing pre-production product samples and ensuring a seamless transition from product development to high volume production.&nbsp; The Manager will bring technical insight and excellent planning skills to the objective of engineering and creating production-like products that the team can use to verify the product solution.&nbsp; Selecting, managing, and improving outside suppliers is a key element of the position, as well as coordinating and fostering Jabil/Nypro support in product development efforts.&nbsp; This position will be responsible for the financial vitality of the &ldquo;materials&rdquo; component of Radius.&nbsp; Additionally, this position will be responsible for improving related engineering department operating systems, and project planning activity.&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">This is a highly visible and dynamic position whose focus will be on Radius site specific and global organizational initiatives.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><strong><span style="font-size: 12pt;">KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:</span></strong></p>
<ul>
<li style="color: #000000;">
<p style="color: #000000; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Provide manufacturing feasibility input throughout the development process</span></p>
</li>
<li style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">
<p style="color: #000000; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Participate in project planning by proposal writing, planning, and budgeting activities</span></p>
</li>
<li style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">
<p style="color: #000000; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Provide strategic guidance to the team and customers in addressing the engineering, pre-production and production needs of projects</span></p>
</li>
<li style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">
<p style="color: #000000; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Qualify suppliers to meet customer&rsquo;s pre-production needs (i.e. &ndash; tool builders, rapid/short run molders, manufacturing development suppliers, materials, etc.)</span></p>
</li>
<li style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">

</li>
<li style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">
<p style="color: #000000; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Inform and update the development team of new manufacturing technologies, materials, and Jabil/Nypro capabilities</span></p>
</li>
<li style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">
<p style="color: #000000; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 11pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Responsible for on-time and on-budget delivery of appropriate-quality product samples</span></p>
</li>
<li style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">

</li>

</li>
<li style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">
<p style="color: #000000; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 11pt;"><span style="color: windowtext; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Collaborate with the quality team internally and with suppliers to match expectations with results</span></p>
</li>
<li style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">
<p style="color: #000000; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 11pt;"><span style="color: windowtext; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Define processes and methods to mitigate risk and deliver expected results</span></p>
</li>
<li style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">

</li>
<li style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">

<li style="line-height: normal; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Good command of both written and spoken English and Chinese</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Provision of periodic continuous professional development training</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Successful candidates with HKIE accredited degree will join the 2 years HKIE Scheme &ldquo;A&rdquo; training</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Other successful candidates not fulfilling HKIE Scheme &ldquo;A&rdquo; requirements will join the Technical Services Officer Trainee Programme</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <ul>
<li style="line-height: normal; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Universities/Technical Colleges graduates from Local/Oversea/Mainland institutes</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">Degree/diploma or above in Surveying or equivalent</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><strong><em><span style="color: #c00000; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 14pt;">&nbsp;</span></em></strong></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><strong><span style="color: black;">Admin &amp; Purchasing Officer</span></strong></span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong><span style="color: black; font-size: 11pt;">Responsibilities:</span></strong></p>
<ul>
<li style="text-align: justify; color: black;"><span style="font-size: 11pt;">Perform general office administrative</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">and operation works</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify; color: black;"><span style="font-size: 11pt;">Communicate with supplier and factory</span></li>
<li style="color: #000000;"><span style="font-size: 11pt;">R</span><span style="font-size: 11pt;">esponsible for ordering, sourcing, <span style="color: black;">order processing, production tracking, inspection arrangement and shipping document preparation</span></span></li>
<li style="color: #000000;"><span style="font-size: 11pt;">Co-ordinate with engineering department and supplier in the purchasing process</span></li>

<li style="text-align: justify; color: black;"><span style="font-size: 11pt;">Assist in ad hoc tasks</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><strong><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Job Summary and Scope of Responsibility:</span></strong></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">The Sourcing Manager is responsible for new factory recommendations and selection to secure favorable commercial terms, ensure the reliable supply of product while meeting quality, cost, and schedule goals.&nbsp; The Sourcing Manager will identify new and/or alternative vendors to improve supply chain effectiveness.&nbsp; This role will also help identify suitable 2nd tier suppliers for the business.&nbsp; The Sourcing Manager will be the subject matter expert of sourcing options and trends for the categories of the business and provide market-based strategies and solutions that meet the company needs.</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Essential Duties and Responsibilities:</span></strong></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Establishes a strong supplier base and develops alternative solutions to achieve product &amp; business objectives. </span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Assists in determining sourcing allocation plans to improve product sourcing and quality rejection rates.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Responsible for working with business partners to develop an annual sourcing plan based on demand analysis, industry / market analysis, supply landscape, supplier segmentation, contingency planning to support existing business and new product launches.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Lead initiatives to reduce the cost base, increase flexibility and performance, and underpin supply reliability within the supply chain by finding new supply sources and/or developing innovative ways to improve existing supply sources.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Maintain knowledge of factors affecting costs such as industry and technology trends, geo-political influences, and related market cost reduction opportunities.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Deep understanding of company product roadmap and long range strategy, to optimize global search.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Provide tactical support for ad hoc purchasing / sourcing requests.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Lead the on-boarding of new factories and continuous improvement of related processes.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">Perform other assigned ad hoc duties</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><strong><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Job purpose:</span></strong></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">The QC/QA Inspector is responsible for assisting with performance of incoming / receiving inspection of electronic components under the direction of the warehouse manager. The QC/QA Inspector determines conformance or non-conformance to specification in support of the release of incoming and in-process materials for use and documents non-conformances for follow up and resolution.</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Responsibilities:</span></strong></p>
<ul>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Ability to perform unaided and microscopic visual inspections on various electronic devises/components</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Perform visual inspections on various electronic devises/components</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Manual dexterity and hand-eye coordination needed to inspect components</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Prepare reports and quality records in compliance with procedures</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Coordinate areas of QC work with other department&rsquo;s work, i.e., receiving, shipping and purchasing</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Perform receipt inspections of material for work area in conjunction with receiving staff</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Report as necessary on changes in quality standards (internal and external)</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Liaise with customers and suppliers where necessary (when quality issues arise)</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Utilize measuring and test equipment, as required to insure accuracy</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Perform additional assignments per supervisor&rsquo;s direction</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Our client is a leading Telecommunication Company. Due to the rapid growth of the company, they are now looking for a talent to join its project team for its Data Center Business</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Lead and manage facilities team of engineers and technicians to operate and maintain mission critical facilities of data centres on 7x24 basis to achieve service level requirements and company targets</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Formulate policies, guidelines, operating procedures, disaster recovery plan, business continuity plans and other method statements and schedules for the operation, maintenance and repair of critical facilities</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Manage and deal with architects and consultants regarding to building services, HVAC systems, electrical services, generators, UPS, fire services, security systems and BMS</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <ul>
<li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 16px;">Degree &nbsp;in civil / structural / geotechnical engineering recognized by HKIE</span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">At least 3 years&rsquo; relevant experience in supervision of foundation/site formation works</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Good command of both English and Chinese</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Immediate available preferred <br></span></li>

</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <div id="company_profile_div" class="jobad_content" style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; line-height: normal; font-size: 12px; color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 新細明體; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: auto; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff;">
<div style="margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px;">
<p style="line-height: 12.0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Duties:</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Report to Japanese </span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Manager and Director</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Handle products promotion </span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">and p</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">repare sales reports</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Customer visiting in Hong Kong for exploring new business</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Maintain &amp; enhance business relationship with customers</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Liaise with factory and customers for order processing</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Oversea trip is required but not often</span></li>

<li>&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Assist in ad-hoc assignment</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <div class="jobad-primary-details " style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; zoom: 1; position: relative; margin: 0px 0px 32px;">

<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; background-color: #ffffff;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; text-align: center; background-color: #ffffff;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; text-align: center; background-color: #ffffff;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; background-color: #ffffff;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-decoration: underline;">Job Requirements</span></strong></p>
<ul style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 1em; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; background-color: #ffffff;">
<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;">At least 5 years experience in&nbsp;<span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; display: inline !important; float: none;">Quality &amp; Reliability (Q&amp;R)&nbsp;</span></span></li>

<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;">Good k<span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-align: justify;">nowledge of&nbsp;<strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;">ISO&nbsp;</strong></span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-align: justify;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;">documentation</strong>, <strong>6-Sigma</strong>,&nbsp;<strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;">Quality Tools</strong>&nbsp;(e.g. 8D, SPC, Root Cause Analysis, DFMEA, DFM...)&nbsp;</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-align: justify;">and&nbsp;</span><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-align: justify;">S</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-align: justify;">afety Standard</span></strong><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-align: justify;">&nbsp;(</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-align: justify;">e.g.&nbsp;</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-align: justify;">UL, TUV, JIS&hellip;)</span></span></li>
