<!-- jobad content --> <p style="background: white; margin: 0cm 0cm 12.0pt 0cm;"><span style="color: #333333; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Our client is a global MNC and <span style="color: #333333; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13.3333px;">Hong Kong's premier telecommunications service provider, they are</span>&nbsp;now looking for a Assistant Voice Engineer (MNC/Telecommunications/Fresh Graduate Opportunities)&nbsp;for their business operations. Our client&nbsp;</span><span style="color: #333333; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13.3333px;">supports a <span style="color: #333333; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13.3333px;">portfolio of integrated global communications solutions and expanding &ldquo;as-a-service&rdquo; solutions including OTT video and Unified Communications.&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p style="background: white; margin: 0cm 0cm 12.0pt 0cm;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="background: white; margin: 0cm 0cm 12.0pt 0cm;"><strong><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; color: #333333;">Job Description</span></strong></p>
<ul>
<li style="color: #333333;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Sustain voice operation by conducting proactive measures and system health check for both international and local leased circuits;&nbsp;</span></li>
<li style="color: #333333;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Contributing with engineering client services, reports and enquirers promptly;</span></li>
<li style="color: #333333;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Follow up with<span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 13.3333px;">&nbsp;identification on private network fault handling in coordinate with internal and external parties for maintaining integrated and uninterrupted service;</span></span></li>
<li style="color: #333333;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Maintain sufficient&nbsp;testing and diagnostic works for fault isolation on IPLC, IEPL, Managed Data Service, IPVPN, Global Internet Service and Customized Network Solution;</span></li>
<li style="color: #333333;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Contribute in&nbsp;monitor service reports and to carry out first line maintenance on equipment and system / network;</span></li>
<li style="color: #333333;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Participate in rotating roaster&nbsp;front-line duties on customer service reports, perform fault isolation and diagnostic function.</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; color: black; font-size: 13.5pt;">Project Engineer&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 10pt;">(Ref. no. HO201704PE(J))</span></span></strong></p>
<p><strong>Responsibility:</strong></p>
<ul>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman','serif';">Responsibilities</span></p>
<ul>
<li style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman','serif';">Responsible for overseeing the entire research and development team</span></li>
<li style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman','serif';">Ensure the success of the company product lines</span></li>

<li style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman','serif';">Cooperate with other teams to identify trends for specific product markets</span></li>

<li style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman','serif';">Implement, maintain and promote R&amp;D knowledge management process</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="color: #000000; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>The Company</strong></span></p>
<p style="color: #000000; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Hanson Robotics develops the world&rsquo;s most humanlike robots, endowed with remarkable expressiveness, aesthetics, and interactivity. Hanson Robotics has built a worldwide reputation for creating robots that look and act genuinely alive, and produced many renowned one-of-a-kind prototypes and products that have received massive media and public acclaim. For more information, visit&nbsp;<a href="http://www.hansonrobotics.com/" target="_blank">www.hansonrobotics.com</a></span></p>
<p style="color: #000000; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Job Role</strong></span></p>
<p style="color: #000000; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">We are looking for an organized and well-rounded professional to join our team for the role of Robotics Technician. You will play a key role in supporting the hardware project team. This is a well-defined role, but in true startup style, where the working environment is dynamic and the role will constantly evolve, you will need to be a self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced environment and are willing to regularly work outside of your comfort zone.</span></p>
<p style="color: #000000; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;"><span style="font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Job Responsibilities</strong></span></p>
<ul style="color: #000000; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">
<li><span style="font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Assist the team with robots development, construction, sculpting, implementation, maintaining and troubleshooting.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Maintain tools and equipment regularly. Update inventory records.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Conduct research to ascertain the best products and suppliers in terms of best value, delivery schedules, and quality.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">All other duties as assigned.</span></li>

<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Responsible for all site workers in the assigned project in particular to the Safety Regulations and Valid working permit by Law</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; background-color: #999999; color: #ffffff;">JOB TITLE:</span></strong></p>

<p style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><strong><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Requirements</span></strong></p>
<ul style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: medium;">

Candidate with less experience will be considered as Assistant Engineer</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><strong><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Job Description</span></strong></span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">As a Project Sales Consultant, you will work closely with Business Development Manager and gradually pick up the sales in Hong Kong market. As the sole distributor of highest quality window coverings in Hong Kong, you will play an important role in existing building projects, dealing with developers, building consultant, architects and designers,. The role is ideal for candidates with strong interest in building projects. </span></p>

<!-- jobad content --> <ul>

<li>Station in Shenzhen</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;"><strong>This is a fixed-term contract position of minimum 2 years with possibility for renewal subject to organization need and individual performance.</strong></span></p>
<p><span style="color: #000000;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">The successful candidate will be responsible for providing support to the Senior Project Engineer, Geotechnical. This involves ensuring that the works are designed, specified and built to achieve the required level of service as well as the specified standards of materials and workmanship; and that they are completed safely, on time and within budget to the satisfaction of the Authority. His/her responsibilities will include:</span></p>

</li>
<li>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 'Univers (WN)',serif; font-size: 12pt;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Reviewing technical proposals and works to ensure reliability and safety;</span></div>
</li>
<li>

</li>
<li>

</li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><strong><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Building Services Project Engineer/Senior Engineer - Electrical </span></strong></p>
<p style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000;"><strong><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Requirements</span></strong></span></p>
<ul style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: medium;">
<li style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Degree holder in Electrical / Electronic / Mechanical / Building Service Engineering or related studies.</span></li>
<li style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Minimum of 8 years&rsquo; relevant experience with focus on ECS, HVAC/MVAC or Electrical Systems for the Project Engineer position.</span></li>
<li style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Candidate with chartership is an advantage for Project Engineer application.</span></li>
<li style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; text-decoration: underline;">Candidate with less experience will be considered as Senior Engineer/ Engineer.</span></span></li>
<li style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Experience in ECS, HVAC/MVAC or Electrical Systems projects coordination, drawing production and report preparation.</span></li>
<li style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Responsible, willing to work under stress and able to catch tight project timeline.</span></li>
<li style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Good written English and Chinese, Spoken English and Cantonese.</span></li>
<li style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">PC, Word Processing, AutoCAD and PowerPoint skills.</span></li>
<li style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Candidate with site experience is an advantage.</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">The incumbent will be responsible for the supervision of a team of technical staff to perform contracting, fitting-out work, project management and day-to-day operations &amp; maintenance works of building services systems in commercial buildings or shopping malls.</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>

</li>
<li>
<div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">At least 6 years&rsquo; relevant experience preferably working in <strong>Contracting Company</strong></span></div>
</li>
<li>

<li>

<li>
<div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="color: #000000;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">S</span><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">trong problem solving and emergency repair</span></span></div>

<div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Candidates with more experience and qualifications will be considered as <strong>Assistant </strong><strong>Engineer</strong><strong>ing Manager</strong></span></div>
</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span lang="EN-US" style="color: black; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;">Requirements</span></p>

<li><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Follow-up projects from designs to mass production</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #000000; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Perform cost analysis and software verification</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p>You will be responsible for contributing to the design, development, manufacturing and testing of new and existing products. Using your engineering expertise and design thinking to create functional and asethetically pleasing products, you are expected to work as an integral member of a multi-disciplinary team at Accutone. You will engage with manufacturers, vendors and partners as you work on the development of new products.</p>
<p><strong>About the Role</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Engineer parts for tight tolerance injection molding</li>
<li>Create development prototypes for testing and validation</li>
<li>Create production documentation</li>
<li>Develop finite element models for analysis and optimization</li>
<li>Perform finite element modeling on metal enclosure, plastic enclosures, battery modules, internal circuit boards and wiring systems to meet performance requirements, which include safety, reliability, weight and cost management</li>
<li>Develop and coordinate material testing procedures to carry out experiments that satisfy project requirements</li>
<li>Provide input in the creation of component specifications, component DFM, and other technical design documents where analysis plays a central role</li>
<li>Document technical data generated in performing the design verification test, supporting the project design reviews</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="margin: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Diploma in Architectural Studies/ Building Services/ Engineering or related disciplines;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">3 years of relevant experience;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Proficient in AutoCAD and Revit;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Good command of both spoken and written English and Chinese;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Candidates with less experience will be considered as Architectural Technician.</span></li>

<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">車身修理工作</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Requirements :</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Degree in Product Design, Industrial Design or related disciplines</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12pt;">At least 3 years' relevant experience</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Strong proficiency in 3D software including KeyShot, Solidworks</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Good command of both spoken and written English</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Good hands-on in conceptualizing, visualizing and delivering creative design solutions</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify; line-height: 13.5pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">Job Responsibilities:</span></strong></p>

<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Responsibilit</span><span style="text-decoration: underline;">ies:</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>The Assistant Engineer, under the supervision of division supervisor or manager, provides technical and maintenance supports to customers. &nbsp;The duties include, but are not limited to, providing repairs and troubleshooting.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>Provide installation, maintenance and support services on electronic product and related software at customer sites;</li>
<li>Liaises with customers in rectifying problems;</li>
<li>Keep and record job related documents properly;</li>
<li>Willing to work outside normal office hours (Monday to Friday);</li>
<li>Saturday/Sunday or Public Holidays (On-call shift).</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><strong><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: 'PMingLiU',serif; color: black;">我們為您提供：</span></strong></p>
<ul>
<li style="color: #3366ff;"><strong><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: 'PMingLiU',serif; color: black;">職前及在職培訓，助你晉身成行業內最頂尖的百萬圓桌（</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: 'PMingLiU',serif; color: black;">MDRT）會員。</span></strong></li>
<li style="color: #3366ff;"><strong><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: 'PMingLiU',serif; color: black;">透過各類型的專業培訓，配合富有經驗的導師提供個人指導，令你更快掌握成功秘訣。</span></strong></li>
<li style="color: #3366ff;"><strong><span style="font-size: 14.0pt; font-family: 'PMingLiU',serif; color: black;">與快樂團隊工作，重視合作精神，一起致達成功。</span></strong></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><strong><em><span style="color: black;">Role Summary:</span></em></strong></span><span style="font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; color: black;">Reporting to Group Chief Operating Officer, this role is responsible to lead and develop the Worldwide Quality Assurance Team to ensure production of high quality of products.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><strong><span style="color: black;">Responsibilities:</span></strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Supervise all regional quality activities for product return analysis and improvement plans</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Oversee and direct the quality direction of the Company and to ensure the effectiveness of quality systems and policies</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Administer quality functions includes Quality Assurance, Quality Engineering and Quality Control</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Direct and manage the quality compliance functions and supplier management systems</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Ensure product safety in compliance to specify international standards and requirements</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Ensure the products and services meet customer needs and expectation</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Identify areas where product or service require corrective actions and drive for continuous improvement</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Direct to conduct internal and external quality audits, to ensure process and procedures are followed</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Responsible for internal and external customer complaints, develop corrective actions plans and monitor the execution when necessary</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">We are looking for a Project Design Manager with substantial fa&ccedil;ade or curtain walling and interior experience to join our innovative design department. You will lead a team to review compliance of design in accordance with projects and dealing with our luxury retail clients, to participate in the project kick-off to execution &amp; maintenance</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Responsibilities:</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Capability to design, understanding technical requirements and the basis of necessary calculations, verifications, tests, etc.</span></li>
<li><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Project manage and lead a professional design team</span></li>
<li><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Successful execution and completion of visual mock-up(s), test mock-up(s), material testing.</span></li>
<li><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Establish a good working relationship with the Architect and design related Consultants.</span></li>
<li><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Participate in the project kick-off, project meetings, design reviews and project reviews covering compliance of design with the project specification, make-transport-install- ability, cost developments, programmes, resources, mock-ups, approvals, etc.</span></li>
<li><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Work closely with Project Manager of any possible variations or claims arising from changes and deviations from contract documents as far as design, scope, mock ups, testing and approvals are concerned.</span></li>

<ul>

<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">To assist with the research of building services materials for use in the contract and where applicable, their costs and sources of supply</span></li>

<li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; color: #000000;">To handle technical problems arising from site difficulties and/or discrepancies in drawings and to refer such matters to the Contract Manager or his representatives for direction</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Requirements for the position of Project Manager:</strong></span></p>

<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Good interpersonal skill, hard-working, initiative and willing to take responsibility;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Good command of written and spoken English;</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p><strong>MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES</strong> include the followings. Other duties may be assigned as necessary to fulfil optimum efficiency of this position:</p>
<p><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Identifies and ensures necessary resources and budget for offer management / bid preparation.</span></span></li>
<li><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Monitors the budget of the offer/bid preparation as well as of possible pre-performances.</span></li>
<li><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Prepares project planning and cost calculation for projects offer/bid.</span></li>
<li><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Undertakes risk assessment with according parties/functions of the factors influencing the project and initiates appropriate clauses for the contract negotiations.</span></li>
<li><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Defines and negotiates project-specific requirements and conditions, and also monitors and records performance of partners/suppliers and directs timely measures for occurring quality deficiencies and problems in the cooperation.</span></li>
<li><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Ensures target objectives driven communication with the project team and reviews their performances based on the objectives.</span></li>
<li><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Proactively develops, promotes and maintains an open and professional relationship with the customer.</span></li>
<li><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Knows and takes into account the operational and strategic environment of the customer. Based on that makes recommendations and decisions..</span></li>
<li><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Develops appropriate risk prevention and mitigation strategies for project(s) and executes them.</span></li>
<li><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Estimates the effects and risks in the project continuously and evaluates them from a financial, process and resource point of view</span></li>
<li><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Performs final project reviews including calculations and sets up a budget versus actual status report for the management.</span></li>
<li><span style="color: black; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="color: black; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;"><span style="font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Identifies further and future business opportunities resulting out of the project or the project environment at any time.</span></span></span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="margin: 0pt;"><strong>MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES</strong> include the followings. Other duties may be assigned as necessary to fulfil optimum efficiency of this position:</p>
<p style="margin: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Be responsible for technical hotline support through the enquiries from telephone call or emails</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Be responsible for In-house repair of spare part. </span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Provide field service support to the customers.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Provide product training to customers and technical training to internal staff.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Support the machine installation for the customers in South East Asia and Asia Pacific.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 10pt;">Prepare report and analysis</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify; line-height: 17.0pt;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong><span style="font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 12pt;">Job Description</span></strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 20pt;">To work collaboratively with other project team members, to manage related issues on the multi-disciplinary projects and liaise with stakeholders on requirements;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 20pt;">Extensive liaison with clients, consultants, contractors, sub-contractors and suppliers, to ensure project commitments and compliance with project budgets and time approved;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 20pt;">Demand to lead the project team site superintendent from inception to completion;</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><strong><span style="color: black;">Requirements:</span></strong></span></p>

<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; color: black; font-size: 10pt;">Preferably with practical experience in TDM/TDMA VSAT hubs and different kinds of SCPC modems.<br> </span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p>Our Client is a leading US based audio company, which manufactures and markets a broad range of consumer electronics that are both innovative and high in quality, key product lines include alarm clock, clock radio, portable speakers, home audio systems, headphones, charging stations, and computer accessories. &nbsp;<br></p><p>Now we are looking for a candidate to join our company in the position of : <br></p><p><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 255); text-decoration: underline;" data-mce-style="text-decoration: underline; color: #0000ff;"><strong>SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER / SOFTWARE ENGINEER / ELECTRONIC ENGINEER (3 POSTS)</strong></span><br></p><p><span style="text-decoration: underline;" data-mce-style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Requirements :</strong></span><br></p><ul><li>Bachelor/Master degree in Computer Science or Electronic Engineering</li><li>With at least 5 years of firmware/embedded experience.</li><li>Familiar with embedded software / firmware development in both C &amp; assembly languages</li><li>Familiar with both 8 bit &amp; 16 bit MCUs</li><li>In-depth knowledge of C/C++ programming and familiar with MCU based programming</li><li>Familiar with software / firmware development for iPhone / iPad dockings &amp; Bluetooth products is preferred</li><li>Capable to communicate in English.</li><li>Preferable to have hardware knowledge.<br></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <div style="text-align: justify;">
<ul>

<!-- jobad content --> <div>As an SME company, but with significant 30-50% year-on-year growth over recent years, our success to date has been due to the effort and achievement of our&nbsp;closely knit team of smart, hands-on people. Our&nbsp;"start-up" style hustling culture and drive for improvement has progressively built up our solid technical reputation and attracts customers seeking support for their technical challenges, manufacturing and quality control opportunities..</div>
<div>We are excited to create a new opportunity for a strong and independent professional to&nbsp;join us as our Senior Product Quality Engineer.</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div><strong>Working life&nbsp;</strong><strong>and what you will be doing at PMD..</strong></div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>At PMD, we know that our success comes from the people who are in our team. The company, your team-mates, will depend on you; your deliverables are the company's deliverables; your expertise will be the company's advantage in the market.&nbsp;</div>
<div>Hand-in-hand with our drive,&nbsp;professional&nbsp;mindset and responsibility comes trust and teamwork.&nbsp;With free-flow Nespresso, refreshments, snacks and choice of tunes in the background and flexi-time, based on a 9am-6pm day with +1 hour, you decide your own daily routine between 9am-10am ~ 6pm-7pm to best suit yourself and your work. &nbsp;</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div>You will be working closely with our Product team, Operations team and our London after-sales team to establish new quality plans, support customer product integration challenges and demonstrate expertise in our technical capabilities to our customers.</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<div><strong>You responsibilities:</strong></div>
<ul>
<li>Independently investigate and lead failure analysis and root cause analysis activities for customer RMAs / corrective actions (CAR); closing down quality investigations and issues</li>
<li>Reviewing product specs and customer requirements to determine non-conformity impact for QC failures identified by the Supplier Quality team</li>
<li>Utilising our Hong Kong quality and engineering lab to design and implement technically robust inspections, testing and qualification to&nbsp;improve product characterisation, specification and manufacturing&nbsp;</li>
<li>Preparing and progressing customer non-conformance communication; NCR, RMA, corrective action reports, and analysing our product ranges to develop and progress Engineering Changes through ECR / ECN processes</li>
<li>Support continuous improvements to company processes to comply with ISO 9001:2015 and other related standards</li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="line-height: normal;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 12pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">Programme Highlights</span></strong></p>
<p style="line-height: normal; text-align: justify;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">We have a strong talent pool in our Company to cope with our strategic growth. Talent is a strategic asset to our Company, and thus we acquire talents and devote to groom them as leaders. Since university graduates are the most fundamental and important part of our talent pool, we have a structural development on&nbsp;</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">high-caliber graduates with an excellent long-term career development.</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal; text-align: justify;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">We have run the programme for over 10 years, many business leaders and technical professionals were grown under this 3-year Executive Development Programme.</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">&nbsp;And we offer comprehensive training, job rotation, project-based exposure, mentor and buddy scheme, and bi-annual package review in this Programme.</span></span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><strong><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;">Responsibilities:</span></strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;">Assist in troubleshooting, analyzing and solving any material quality issues related to product</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Job specification:</strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Sources &amp; develops new vendors &amp; electronic components for NPI projects &amp; high technology products development.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Assists managers &amp; commodity leaders developing strategies / tactics in respects of supply management, procurement, supplier selection and cost reduction.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Strategies implementation in order to bring the maximum contributions to the company.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Provides technical advices and also working on RFQ exercises and complete each exercise in timely manner.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Conduct negotiations in terms of costs, quality, engineering, documentation, delivery &amp; lead time etc. in accordance with the directions given from manager / RFQ leaders.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Drives projects and manage well the transferring process to tactical buying teams seamlessly.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Perform additional or ad-hoc assignments as per supervisor&rsquo;s direction.</span></li>

<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">提供技術及意見予銷售部門和客戶</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">參與各類型工程項目，以滿足顧客對衛浴潔具的技術及品質的要求</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="color: #333333;">(This position is not a sales role)</span></p>
<p><span style="text-decoration: underline; color: #333333;"><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="color: #333333;">Be responsible for determining piece cost, tooling cost and machining for new and replacement parts quotations to customers;</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #333333;">Review periodically the price list in accordance with the agreement reached with customer and make adjustment (if required);</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #333333;">Evaluate and follow up the specifications of RFQ including but not limited to customer specifications/drawings, liaise with cross functional teams for internal submission of </span><br><span style="color: #333333;">quotations/best solutions through customer service team;</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #333333;">Evaluate the applicable cost factors, ensure the accuracy and competitiveness of quotations and improve the quality of quotations;</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #333333;">Coordinate closely with internal teams to provide technical solution, solution design and recommend solutions to customers;</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #333333;">Review internal process, make suggestions for improvement and drive work efficiency and cost effectiveness;</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #333333;">Provide timely and accurate report for management review;</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #333333;">Attend on-the-job training in China manufacturing site(s) whenever necessary;</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #333333;">Handle other tasks as assigned by management;</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p><strong><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">JOB PURPOSE:</span></strong><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Perform Equipment Installation, Service and Repair for all ranges of Cantel Medivators Equipment, including, but not limited to Medivators, Mar-Cor, Procedure Room Products and Renal System, within Hong Kong. Provide User Training and troubleshooting support, etc., in the Hong Kong as required. Report to the National Sales Manager in field and technical service support, manage spare parts inventory and documentation.</span></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Develop and Implement Technical Service Function for Cantel Medical Product Families</span></strong></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Ensure that the service plan are executed as per the schedule&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Perform equipment installations,</span><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">preventive maintenance, and repair of equipment and products in the field as assigned</span></li>

<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Provide in-service session for the customers and conduct equipment and assist product clinical trials demonstrating applications with regards to systems, accessories and techniques</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Provide applications/user/technical training</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">File product complaints according to procedure</span></li>

<p><span style="color: #008080; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong><span lang="AR-SA">要求：</span></strong></span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span lang="ZH-TW">註冊</span><span lang="AR-SA">升降機工程人員</span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span lang="AR-SA">工程</span><span lang="ZH-TW">科</span><span lang="AR-SA">証書或同等學歷</span></span></li>

<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><span lang="AR-SA">有電工</span>A<span lang="AR-SA">牌</span><span lang="ZH-TW">或</span><span lang="AR-SA">維修自動化機械經驗</span><span lang="ZH-TW">者</span><span lang="AR-SA">會被優先考慮</span></span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">The Primex Family of Companies designs and sells products in both the consumer and commercial markets, specializing in time, temperature and weather instrument products. We are seeking a <strong>high-caliber professional</strong> in our Hong Kong office to aid in our expansion across these dynamic markets:</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Digital Project Manager </span></strong></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>
<p><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">Work with existing HK team, US product management and design team, and third-party factories in China to:</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>
<ol>
<li style="color: #000000;"><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">Turn written concepts into actual products (</span><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">digital </span><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">weather stations, </span><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">high-definition displays, synchronous clocks, transmitters, and Bluetooth, Wifi and 433 mhz products</span><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">), while hitting tight cost and delivery targets </span></li>
<li style="color: #000000;"><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">Must be able to perform technical and cost analysis of new product requirements, </span><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">including with LCD, TFT, Bluetooth, USB and Wi-Fi products, </span><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif;">and work with third-party factories to turn written concepts into actual products </span></li>
<li style="color: #000000;"><span style="font-family: 'Arial',sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">Assist in trouble shooting and root cause any Quality issues</span></li>
</ol>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>

updating SLA/KPI on regular basis.</li><li>Managing the purchase order and payment request to Ariba system as per users' requests.</li><li>Managing and keeping stocks the COs and draft notes and distribute to HK Finance upon requests.</li><li>Updating Fire Marshal list, first-aiders and coordinating all related activities (i.e. fire drills, identify fire marshal and training).</li><li>Responsible for access card issuance, editing and deletion for the Exchange Square office.</li><li>Managing and following up with the archiving issues with users and service vendors.</li><li>Priming helpdesk operator to man the General Helpdesk hotline, including building's facilities, access card issuance &amp; <!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: center; line-height: normal;"><strong><span style="font-size: 12.0pt;">Product Operational Compliance Specialist &ndash; (Chemical Engineering)</span></strong></p>
<p style="text-align: center; line-height: normal;"><strong><span style="font-size: 12.0pt;">&nbsp;</span></strong></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><strong><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Purpose of the Job</span></strong></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">ACCO Brands is seeking a Product Operational Compliance Specialist to join its Legal and Compliance team based in Hong Kong or Guangzhou, China. &nbsp;The primary responsibilities of this position include managing compliance operations activities with ACCO Brands Asia team for the US and EU markets including certifications, testing and other compliance verification programs.&nbsp; In addition, this role will work closely with suppliers and ACCO Brands development teams to ensure that all products are being manufactured to comply with ACCO Brands Product Compliance Policy and Programs. </span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="line-height: normal;"><strong><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Responsibilities and Duties:</span></strong></p>
<ul>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Implement product compliance programs to ensure SKU-level compliance with all country-level and applicable product compliance core requirements and market standards including but not limited Corporate Compliance program requirements, RSL, US, Canada and EU requirements.</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Collaborate with suppliers and ensure execution of compliance requirements for finished products.</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Collaborate with suppliers and third-party laboratories or approval agencies to execute compliance plans.</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Collaborate with suppliers to implement RSL chemical verification during the manufacturing process and manage RSL certifications.</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Be the primary contact for third-party laboratories and approval agencies for Asia-based manufacturing.&nbsp; </span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Review and verify compliance results meet requirements for finished products which may include obtaining and managing certificates of compliance, safety certifications, test reports and other documentations for Product Technical Files.</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Provide results from compliance activities to appropriate stakeholders.</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Represent Operational Compliance by actively participating on new product development teams, as applicable.</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Coordinate and manage on-going compliance approval update activities for finished products.</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Evaluate suppliers&rsquo; internal functions to assess their overall compliance performance and provide feedback.</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Assist in implementation of tools to assure ongoing process monitoring and performance improvements.</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Provide training, guidance, and support to suppliers and ACCO Brands teams to increase awareness of Compliance requirements.</span></li>
<li style="line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; color: #232629;">Other duties as assigned</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p>Job description and responsibilities</p>
<ul>
<li>Project planning, preparation and supervision;</li>
<li>On site inspections and surveying;</li>
<li>Assisting field work;</li>
<li>Coordination with clients;</li>
<li>Coordination and arrangement of work;</li>
<li>Preparation of report and analysis;</li>
<li>Reporting to project manager or its delegate.</li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="color: #000000; font-family: times new roman,times,serif; font-size: 12pt;"><strong>Requirements</strong></span></p>

<li><span style="color: #000000; font-family: times new roman,times,serif; font-size: 12pt;">University Degree in Civil Engineering&nbsp;and&nbsp;HKI</span><span style="color: #000000; font-family: times new roman,times,serif; font-size: 12pt;">E&nbsp;academic requirements for Corporate Membership or equivalent; </span></li>
<li><span style="color: #000000; font-family: times new roman,times,serif; font-size: 12pt;">at least 3 years&nbsp;experience&nbsp;in the capacity of &nbsp;Site Agent&nbsp;or above of which 2 years shall be in road and drainage works.</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; background-color: #ffffff;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: medium;">To cope with the expansion of the Company, our client is seeking for high caliber candidates to join the Quality Team:</span></p>
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; background-color: #ffffff;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;">&nbsp;</strong></p>
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; text-align: center; background-color: #ffffff;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: medium;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; color: #0000ff;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;">Assistant Quality Manager /&nbsp;</strong><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;">Senior Quality Engineer </strong><span style="color: #800080;"><strong>(QA / QC)</strong></span></span></span></p>
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; text-align: center; background-color: #ffffff;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: medium;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; color: #0000ff;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">(5 days, 20-35K)</span></span></span></p>
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; text-align: center; background-color: #ffffff;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; text-align: center; background-color: #ffffff;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin: 0px 0px 1em; zoom: 1; position: relative; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; background-color: #ffffff;"><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-weight: bold;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; text-decoration: underline;">Job Requirements</span></strong></p>
<ul style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 1em; color: #333333; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; line-height: 20px; widows: 1; background-color: #ffffff;">
<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; font-size: 10pt;">At least 4 years QA / QC experience in manufacturing environment</span></li>
<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Degree in Engineering, Total Quality Management or related discipline</span></li>
<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Good k<span style="text-align: justify;">nowledge of <strong>ISO </strong></span><span style="text-align: justify;"><strong>documentation</strong>, <strong>Quality Tools</strong> (e.g. 8D, SPC, Root Cause Analysis) </span><span style="text-align: justify;">and </span><strong><span style="text-align: justify;">S</span><span style="text-align: justify;">afety Standard</span></strong><span style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;(</span><span style="text-align: justify;">e.g. </span><span style="text-align: justify;">UL, TUV, JIS&hellip;)</span></span></li>
<li style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none;"><span style="font-size: 10pt;">Good command of English and Mandarin</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Job Duties</strong></span></span></p>
<ul style="text-align: justify;">
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;"><strong>Support Project Manager to liaise with various parties (i.e Barge Operators / Clients / Contractors) to coordinate for the discharge of construction material at jobsites (e.g. Tung Chung);</strong></span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Carry out regular checking &amp; record for the Quality &amp; Volume Quantity of construction material unload at jobsites;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Monitor sub-contractors&rsquo; work progress &amp; performance standard. Report to superior &amp; Management for any irregularity;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Preparation of various Daily Reports;&nbsp;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Act as the next contact point, accompany Project Manager to attend regular meetings with stakeholders if needed;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">To prepare project related presentations and documents;</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;">Support ad hoc projects as assigned by Superior / Management from time to time<br><br><br></span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: times new roman,times,serif; font-size: 12pt;">Planet Payment, Inc, a leading international payment and data processor, provides internationally focused banks and their merchants with innovative solutions that enable them to accept, process and reconcile payments, anytime, anywhere and in any currency.&nbsp; Headquartered in New York, our global commercial centers include Atlanta, Beijing, Bermuda, Delaware, Hong Kong, Honolulu, London, Shanghai, Singapore, Toronto and Dubai.</span></p>
<p style="margin: 0in 0in 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: times new roman,times,serif; font-size: 12pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>

<!-- jobad content --> <h1>Draftsman</h1>
<p class="job-ad-job-desc jobDesc"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><strong>&nbsp;R</strong><strong>equirements:</strong></span></p>
<div class="job-ad-job-desc jobDesc">
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 12pt;">F.5&nbsp;or above.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12pt;">1 year or above experience with AUTOCAD.&nbsp;Fresh<span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; line-height: 20px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">&nbsp;Graduate will be </span></span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; outline: none; line-height: 20px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">considered.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Good command of English and Cantonese.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Good computer skills on MS Word, Excel.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Hardworking, responsible.</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">As we work with international design houses on housewares and promotional gifts, the duties of our project engineers are to:</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Communicate with factories in China for smooth product development.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Evaluate and exchange ideas with overseas customers and suppliers in respect of bill of material, product safety, durability, and so on.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Monitor product development progress according to confirmed schedule.</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12.0pt; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif';">Meet with customers and report to customers regularly of matters regarding new product development.</span></li>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><strong>Looking for more?</strong> </span><br><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span><br><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">More responsibility, more output, more success? And would you have fun working in a dynamic team and making some real things happen? Then you&rsquo;ve come to the right place. With some 6,600 employees at various locations and a range of products from circuit boards to passive &amp; electromechanical components and solar technology, we feel right in Asia in lots of growth markets and can offer you the best opportunities for furthering your career. To market our passive components and EMC ferrites and inductors we are looking for a Field Application Engineer </span><br><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif;"><strong>Your job</strong> </span></p>

<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; color: #000000;">Provide technical support (Networking, Server and Desktop) for customers</span></li>

<li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; color: #000000;">To perform other related duties as required</span></li>




<!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;">職責範疇：</span></strong></span></p>

<!-- jobad content --> <p style="text-align: left;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: 'Helvetica','sans-serif'; color: #333333;">Our client is a global factory base MNC and&nbsp;Hong Kong's <span style="color: #333333; font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13.3333px;">premier&nbsp;</span>largest scale plastic injection tooling service provider, with 12,000 square feet production base in Hong Kong they are&nbsp;now looking for a Project Engineer (Plastic Injection Tooling)&nbsp;for their business operations. <!-- jobad content --> <p><span style="font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;">Our client is a leading Telecommunication Company. Due to the rapid growth of the company, they are now looking for a talent to join its project team for its Data Center Business</span></p>

<div><strong>Engineering project management company with focus in spa facilities and swimming pools projects (water work/plumbing projects) in Hong Kong, China and Asia region&nbsp; &ndash; is looking for a&nbsp; <span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="color: #0000ff;">PROJECT ENGINEER</span></span>&nbsp; &ndash; with details as follows : </strong></div>

<div>&nbsp;</div>
<ul>
<li><strong>Tertiary education in Engineering preferably in Building Services or Mechanical Engineering; or equivalent </strong></li>
<li><strong>2 to 5 years experience preferably in E&amp;M/fitting out construction works/plumb drain/swimming pool/building service/spa/hotel construction experience </strong></li>
<li><strong>Project management and site management experience </strong></li>
<li><strong>Capable of handling project from preliminary stage to work completion </strong></li>
<li><strong>Knowledge of AutoCad or other CAD drawing </strong></li>
<li><strong>Experience in plumbing system or electrical control system will be an advantage </strong></li>
<li><strong>Experience in swimming pool or water feature projects is an advantage </strong></li>
<li><strong>Able to work independently with minimum supervision needed </strong></li>
<li><strong>Good interpersonal and communication skill </strong></li>
<li><strong>License Plumber will be a plus, not a must </strong></li>
<li><strong>Reporting to the Senior Project Manager </strong></li>
<li><strong>Responsible for project management of spa facilities and swimming pools projects in Hong Kong and Macau </strong></li>
<li><strong>Site meeting and coordination, submission, testing and commissiong to handover </strong></li>
<li><strong>Site supervision and inspection to monitor the work progress and ensure quality meet Company standard </strong></li>
<li><strong>Coordinating and monitoring the work of contractors and sub-contractors </strong></li>
<li><strong>Monitoring project progress to meet deadline </strong></li>
<li><strong>Occasional trip to Macau </strong></li>
<li><strong>14 days annual leave </strong></li>
<li><strong>Medical benefits </strong></li>
<li><strong>Candidates with more solid experience will be considered for the post of&nbsp;&nbsp; <span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span style="color: #0000ff;">Senior Project Engineer / Asst Project Manager </span></span></strong></li>
